coreAttributes.name: crude foot wrap
coreAttributes.description: A pair of very crude foot wraps, which are little more than bundles of cloth tied up with strips of leather.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your foot wraps.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s foot wraps and roughly pull them off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your foot wraps and roughly pulls them off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s foot wraps and roughly pulls them off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the foot wraps.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.feet] into the foot wraps.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the foot wraps onto [npc.her] [npc.feet].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.feet] into the foot wraps.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the foot wraps onto your [pc.feet].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the foot wraps onto [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
